name: The Book of Good
description:
Play as Yvonne in this first-person, short, single life horror adventure. There are no second chances. Complete the tasks her mother started and be careful--stay alive!

With only a flashlight and your wits, you must face unsettling encounters with the mysterious residents of the home. Find items and learn the secrets of the house and what lies below while searching for the Book of Good. Learn the history of the family who lived there. Who were Michelle, Tobias and Cassie? Why was the Book of Good so important to them?

You must find your brother who is lost in the mansion. Where is he, who took him? And make sure you stay away from what lives in the house--they are not friendly. They do not want you here.

Find the Book of Good and what it means. Get out of the house as soon as possible!
